topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5588fc5b6368725973002529#post_5588fc5b6368725973002529
Unfortunately, yeah. And from increasingly endangered species, very wasteful as well. Primary consumers of shark fins are Chinese.

There is a famous Fujianese dish "that uses shark fins":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buddha_Jumps_Over_the_Wall

Shark fins and Foie gras are illegal in California.
